column5: how many guys buy tickets and have you ever won anything ??

I have been a member of the OFAH for 20 years and I have bought my book of tickets from almost day one and I have never won a thing ! Kinda makes me wonder if my tickets are even in the draw when I send them back You have to figure after 20 years I would win at the very least a pen or something ! Maybe this will be my year , or maybe not !!!!!

10 tickets out of some 100,000 is pretty slim odds, even after 20 years. I'm still buying Then again I've been buying lottery tickets since the very first with the $10 Olympic Lottery and the $5 books of Wintario tickets.
I buy my them as well. Best way is to think of it is as a donation to a worthy cause and if you win anything it's a bonus.
It cost them more to run the lottery than they bring in, but it sure is a great chance at a nice prizes
This is why I still buy them , if it was something else I would of gave up long ago !
usually buy a ticket every year, never won. don't really expect to either,
I buy them as well and have never won.

Do you have any data to back that up? They claim to paid for their new building near Peterborough with lottery proceeds.  I used to buy a lot of tickets. I usually buy one each year now when I am the Sportsman Show. I have never won anything but I keep hoping.
i have the data .. but i do not want to turn this into my normal ofah rant... i will pm you what i have ... i just want to see who has one
